name: Cityverse of Food Waste
description:
Cityverse of Food Waste is a Virtual Reality World created by 5GOG, based around a city to raise awareness on how much food is gone to waste nationwide and educating people on how to try to avoid wasting food and become more sustainable with food waste. 

We want to encourage people to be aware of food waste by showing them a normal virtual reality of a city but the hidden amount of food waste going on daily in different area. Through using superhero theme that represents inspiration, courage and bravery which will encourage the public to do heroic deeds such as ending food waste to save humans from hunger and Earth from being destroyed, affecting animals as well.

Try out our application now <3

- 5GOG
